data.text: a usually undesirable or unpleasant choice
examples: faces this dilemma: raise prices or reduce staff
Here am I brought to a very pretty dilemma; I must commit murder or commit matrimony …
Lords and bailiffs were in a terrible dilemma.
Unemployment … the great central dilemma of our advancing technology.

data.text: a situation involving such a choice; broadly: predicament
examples: faces this dilemma: raise prices or reduce staff
Here am I brought to a very pretty dilemma; I must commit murder or commit matrimony …
Lords and bailiffs were in a terrible dilemma.
Unemployment … the great central dilemma of our advancing technology.

data.text: a problem involving a difficult choice
examples: faces this dilemma: raise prices or reduce staff
Here am I brought to a very pretty dilemma; I must commit murder or commit matrimony …
Lords and bailiffs were in a terrible dilemma.
Unemployment … the great central dilemma of our advancing technology.
